On Sunday 2 June 2019 the Sunday Mirror and Sunday People will increase cover price by 10p to £1.70.
As a result of this price move, profit paid to retailers will increase to 34.85p per copy sold.
Many thanks for your continued, much valued support for all of the Reach titles.
The Reach Newspaper Sales Team
Barcode information: effective from June 2, 2019:
Sunday Mirror 9770956807473
Sunday People 9770956808173
